name: tvastra-public
description: Web-app made using MERN technologies so as to aid the users, doctors to gather, provide information to one another and to serve as a platform for doctors to provide their schedules and other information and for patients to be able to book appointments with them doctors for their aid. The web-app includes functionalities like that of login, login with otp, being able to add medical records,update details,reschedule and review their appointments and a lot more.
author: Vedant
